main event: A round object the size of a tennis ball was observed traveling at a very high speed in Rhodesia, Africa.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by several RRAF personnel., The object was described as greenish colored and tennis-ball shaped., The sighting lasted for about 3 seconds., It was speculated that the object could have been a fireball or balloon., The speed reported was far below that of any known conventional aircraft.
sighted object: one round object like the size of a tennis ball
witness description: RRAF personnel who observed the object
